thread.title: Male pedestrian critical after being struck by vehicle in Mississauga
thread.title_full: Male pedestrian critical after being struck by vehicle in Mississauga | CP24.com

author: Paul Johnston, CP24.com
title: Male pedestrian critical after being struck by vehicle in Mississauga
text:
A man is being airlifted to hospital after being struck by a vehicle in Mississauga.
It happened at Eglinton Avenue and Hurontario Street at around 8 p.m.
The circumstances surrounding the incident were not immediately clear.
The victim, believed to be in his 50s, is in critical condition, Ornge said.
Police continue to investigate at the scene.
